definition: a bar of magnetic material (as soft iron) that passes through a coil and serves to increase the inductance of the coil, to remove the core or center from
details:
noun
- a bar of magnetic material (as soft iron) that passes through a coil and serves to increase the inductance of the coil
- the chamber of a nuclear reactor containing the fissile material where the reaction takes place
- (computer science) a tiny ferrite toroid formerly used in a random access memory to store one bit of data
= synonyms: magnetic core
- the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience
= synonyms: substance
- the central meaning or theme of a speech or literary work
= synonyms: burden, essence, effect, gist
- a small group of indispensable persons or things
= example: a small group of indispensable persons or things
= synonyms: nucleus, core group
- the center of an object
= example: the center of an object
- the central part of the Earth
- a cylindrical sample of soil or rock obtained with a hollow drill
verb
- to remove the core or center from
= example: to remove the core or center from
